title: Layer-2 Blockchains Host Most Ethereum Transactions: Messari

title: BitVM unveils a new horizon: Enabling Ethereum-like smart contracts on Bitcoin
description: In a groundbreaking revelation, Robin Linus, the project lead of ZeroSync, unveiled a white paper on October 9th, introducing BitVM – a mechanism designed to bring more expressive off-chain smart contracts to Bitcoin without necessitating a soft fork. This innovative approach, which is based on Ethereumâ€™s optimistic rollups and recent developments in Merkle tree technology, ... Read more

title: Binance innovates futures trading with the introduction of Copy Trading
description: Binance, a globally recognized cryptocurrency exchange, has unveiled a pioneering feature in select markets, specifically tailored for its futures products – Copy Trading. This groundbreaking initiative enables users to meticulously observe and emulate the trading strategies and portfolios of seasoned traders. The move not only fosters an interactive and educational environment within the trading community ... Read more
